original_text: And he made the Hall of the Throne where he was to pronounce judgment, even the Hall of Judgment. It was finished with cedar from floor to rafters.
korean_text: 또 심판하기 위하여 보좌의 주랑 곧 재판하는 주랑을 짓고 온 마루를 백향목으로 덮었고

sentences.original_text: And he made the Hall of the Throne
where he was to pronounce judgment
It was finished with cedar from floor to rafters.
